summary: Michael and Sara wed, but the happiness is short-lived when the Feds apprehend her for the murder of Michael's mother, Christina. Once a hit is ordered on Sara, the team reunite to break out the increasingly vulnerable target.
cast: Dominic Purcell|Wentworth Miller|Amaury Nolasco|Robert Knepper|Jodi Lyn O'Keefe|Sarah Wayne Callies|William Fichtner|Leon Russom|Kim Coates|Barbara Eve Harris|Chris Bruno|David Starzyk|Aisha Hinds|Lori Petty|Amy Aquino|Jeff Cahill|Dendrie Taylor|Joseph Will|Damien Leake|Ian Patrick Williams|Rainbow Borden|Livia Treviño|Alicia Lagano|Dot-Marie Jones|Richmond Arquette|Sufe Bradshaw|Peggy Dunne|Joey Oglesby|Rena Owen|Roberto Montesinos|John Eric Bentley|Gary Grubbs|Kathleen Quinlan|Lindsay Collins|Sara Gianola|Adrienne McQueen|'Big' LeRoy Mobley|Alice Ndirangu|JD Piché|Heather Rose
title: Prison Break: Evasión final
